Description: Employee terminated without notice for alleged misconduct. No written warning was given. Employee is threatening to sue for wrongful termination and emotional distress.
Supplier failed to deliver raw materials on time, causing a production halt. The contract has a penalty clause for delays, but they are citing Force Majeure due to local strikes.
Received a Cease and Desist from a competitor claiming our new logo infringes on their trademark. We have been using a similar logo for 5 years.
Renewal of office lease agreement. Landlord is asking for a 15% rent hike, which is higher than the market rate. Need to negotiate terms.
A minor data breach occurred where 50 customer emails were exposed. Need to know if we are required to report this to the authorities under the DPDP Act.
